subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin will miss the Washington Capitals’ game at Buffalo on Saturday to visit his ailing grandfather in Russia. Ovechkin, who also sat out Tuesday, is expected back next week.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin will miss the Washington Capitals’ game at Buffalo on Saturday to visit his ailing grandfather in Russia. Ovechkin, who also sat out Tuesday, is expected back next week.
